backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining order, payment, and build-status types with CRUD operations for orders and status updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing short functional summaries for numerous frontend source files and utilities.
frontend/android/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to preserve the empty Android platform directory.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration specifying app metadata, web directory, and Android build options.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color variables, dark mode tokens, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with meta tags, favicon, PWA manifest, and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/public/ads.txt: Ads.txt configuration listing authorized advertising account for Google AdSense.
frontend/public/downloads/.gitkeep: Placeholder to keep the downloads directory in version control.
frontend/public/downloads/README.md: Instructions for managing and building downloadable APKs stored in the downloads directory.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and startup settings.
frontend/README-android-apk.md: Documentation explaining how to build the Android APK using Capacitor and required tooling.
frontend/scripts/predeploy-verify.sh: Script running pre-deployment verification via the main verify-build script.
frontend/scripts/retry-build-deploy.sh: Automated build-and-deploy script with logging and step-by-step execution helpers.
frontend/scripts/verify-build.sh: Comprehensive build verification script performing static checks, dependency install, type check, lint, and build.
frontend/scripts/verify-static-assets.sh: Checks for required generated static asset files and exits with an error listing any missing ones before build/deploy.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing navigation, ordering flow, APK download checks, admin login, and conditional admin dashboard rendering.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminApkDo: Admin-only button that checks for admin APK availability and initiates download or shows an unavailable message.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Main admin dashboard that loads orders, applies filters, shows stats, and renders sections like owner settings, build status, and orders table.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: PIN-based admin login modal that validates a 4-digit PIN and stores the admin token.
frontend/src/components/admin/BuildDeplo: Displays the latest frontend build, installation, and deploy status with logs and success indicators.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderDetai: Side panel showing full order details with status update controls and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersFilt: Filter controls for admin orders, allowing filtering by payment and order status.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersTabl: Table listing orders with key details, badges, timestamps, and a view action to open order details.
frontend/src/components/admin/OwnerSetti: Owner-only settings section exposing advanced business settings like ad configuration.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdsHeadInjec: Injects the provider’s head script at runtime when ads are enabled and configured.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSlot.tsx: Renders a configured ad slot by mounting ad snippets if ads are enabled and the slot is defined.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdsSettingsP: Provides a dialog UI for configuring AdSense settings, validating input, and saving to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/HashtagsBlock.ts: Displays a styled list of hashtags loaded from configuration.
frontend/src/components/OrderForm.tsx: Renders plate selection and quantity input, validates minimum order rules, and creates orders via a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPhoto.tsx: Shows a founder photo with size options and falls back to a placeholder image on load error.
frontend/src/components/PostOrderConfirm: Modal for payment confirmation with UPI options, WhatsApp fallback links, and UTR submission handling.
frontend/src/components/PromoPopup.tsx: Timed promotional popup encouraging ordering, dismissible and stored per session.
frontend/src/components/SimpleModal.tsx: Generic modal displaying a message with optional WhatsApp link and copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/config/ads.ts: Defines ads configuration and helpers to generate AdSense head and slot scripts.
frontend/src/config/apk.ts: Provides APK metadata for customer and admin apps including URLs, versions, and labels.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Exports centralized contact phone and location values.
frontend/src/config/footer.ts: Defines footer tagline, copyright text, and quick‑link metadata.
frontend/src/config/hashtags.ts: Provides a constant list of hashtags used across the application.
frontend/src/config/ownerPhotos.ts: Exports URLs for founder images in multiple sizes plus defaults.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Contains business UPI ID, delivery charge, and payment‑related constants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuthorization: Tracks admin authorization based on URL hash and token presence with reactive updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: Fetches all orders for admin view when authorization and actor availability are valid.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdsConfig.ts: Combines stored settings, environment checks, and snippet generation to produce runtime ads config.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateOrder.ts: Provides a mutation to create orders via the backend actor and invalidates order queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, loading, and stored identity through a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useLastBuildStatus.ts: Fetches the backend’s last build/deploy status for admin monitoring with periodic refresh.
Provides a mutation to update order status and refreshes admin order data on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePaymentConfi: Custom React Query mutation hook calling backend to update an order's payment confirmation and refreshing the orders query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base config defining color variables, dark mode theme, and basic animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/adminAccess.ts: Utility functions for reading, validating, setting, and clearing an admin PIN token stored in the URL hash.
frontend/src/lib/ads.ts: Utilities for safely injecting ad provider scripts and mounting or unmounting ad slot snippets in the DOM.
frontend/src/lib/adsenseSnippet.ts: Parses AdSense script snippets to extract and validate a ca-pub client ID.
frontend/src/lib/adsOwnerSettings.ts: Manages AdSense owner settings in localStorage with validation, change events, and helper utilities.
frontend/src/lib/apkAvailability.ts: Checks APK availability, retrieves APK size, triggers downloads, and provides messages for customer and admin APKs.
frontend/src/lib/orderRules.ts: Defines minimum delivery rules and provides helper functions for validating order quantities and generating messages.
frontend/src/lib/runtimeEnvironment.ts: Detects whether the app runs in a Capacitor native wrapper or a standard web environment.
frontend/src/lib/upi.ts: Builds UPI payment links, opens payment apps like Paytm or Google Pay, and supports copying UPI links.
frontend/src/lib/vpaValidation.ts: Validates UPI VPAs against format rules and placeholder patterns and provides a generic error message.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Provides helpers to build WhatsApp message links for orders, payments, and screenshot confirmations, plus functions to open those links in a new tab.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related files, enabling strict mode and ESNext modules.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, environment variable injection, path aliases, dev server proxying, and build options.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, implemented features, pending requests, and architectural notes.
